Description.Name: Breaking News
Description.Details:
Darius pulls up beside you in a hurry. "Commander you have to come to the Command Center. You're not going to believe it. We're on C.B.S"

Darius smiles as you both make your way to the Command Center. 

"This is a C.B.S. Breaking News Alert...The Capellan Confederation has extended an open bounty to five mercenary companies to hunt down and eliminate a rogue company of the Wolf's Dragoons for war crimes against the Confederation. The companies named by our exclusive source are Broadsword Legion, Gray's Ghosts, Lone Star Regiment, The Knights of Caerbannog  and {COMPANY.CompanyName}. The amount of the bounty has not been disclosed. But is reportedly very large."

Darius turns to you and asks. "So {COMMANDER.FirstName}, are we going wolf hunting?"

Description.Name: Task Darius with finding more about the contract.
Description.Details: The company is going wolf hunting.

Description.Name: Darius reaches out to get the details of the contract.
Description.Details:
Darius provides an update. "I was able to get the details of the contract Commander."

He hesitates for a moment. "That Wolf's Dragoons company was pulling garrison duty on Repulse when their commander snapped. No one knows exactly why, either. But after the dust settled. They'd wiped out the entire settlement down to the last man, woman, and child. Needless to say, the Cappies are anxious or payback. They tracked the outfit to the planet Dicon. Which is where we'll need to head for the contract, Commander."

Description.Name: Pass on the contract opportunity.
Description.Details: Tell Darius not to worry about looking into the contract.

Description.Name: Darius stands down from looking into the contract.
Description.Details:
Darius nods, and makes the order.

"Alright Commander I understand. We won't be getting our 15 minutes of fame on C.B.S. It's a shame. I think I'd look good on Holo-Vid."He says with a chuckle.
